title: Socket-outlets
fullText:
The earthing contact of every socket-outlet shall be earthed.
Exceptions:
1.	An earthing contact of a socket-outlet supplied as a separated circuit shall be bonded to the protective bonding system, in accordance with Clause 7.4.
2.	In accordance with Clause 7.5.fO, a socket-outlet supplied as an extra-low voltage circuit shall not be provided with an earthing contact.
